hero.headline: Countdown to camping
hero.tagline: We’re ready to sip coffee outside, watch the sunset in our sleeping bag, and smell like a campfire. Are you?

promos.text: Don't let a little mud stop you. Waterproof hiking footwear means smiles for miles.
Get a taste of freedom with a responsive bike and lightweight kit.
A well-made raincoat makes all the difference. Find yours for rainy seasons now and to come.
Top picks and all-time favourite cooking gear to bring gourmet sizzle to camp.
